Story: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

Title: Mimamsa
Story: The backdrop of the mystical city of Bhopal, the capital of Madhya Pradesh- but also a city that conceals many shadows in its ancient walls.

Title: Sir
Story: A prosperous young Indian man falls in love with his servant, a widow with the dream of becoming a fashion designer.

Title: Mumbaikar
Story: The story is based on the life of people at Mumbai which includes their happiness, drama, fun, and romance which interlink their lives.

Title: Stree
Story: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.

Title: Dil Dhadakne Do
Story: The Mehra family must contemplate over their way of living and their love lives while on a cruise celebrating their 30th wedding anniversary.

Title: Kabir Singh
Story: An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.

Title: Guthlee Ladoo
Story: Guthlee, son of a poor sweeper, has a dream - to go to school. But the obstacle is his caste. A headmaster is sympathetic to him but powerless against caste discrimination. When they develop an unspoken bond, Guthlee's dream sees hope.

Title: Kuttey
Story: A van carrying crores of cash. One rainy night in the outskirts of Mumbai. Unaware of each other, three stray gangs cross paths on the hunt. Unfortunately, all of them have the same plan. Will they bite the bone or will they lose to greed?

Title: Article 15
Story: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

Title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
Story: A breathtaking, goose flesh igniting, awe inspiring love journey of an ordinary man Suri and his 'total opposite' love Taani.

Title: Ghost Stories
Story: The winning team of "Lust Stories" reunites to tell some spine-chilling tales. "Ghost Stories" is a 2020 Indian anthology horror film consisting of four short film segments.

Title: Chhichhore
Story: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

Title: Goodbye
Story: A heartwarming story of the Bhalla family that depicts their journey of grief and self-discovery after they suffer the loss of their loved one.

Title: Prem Ki Shaadi
Story: Add a Plot

Title: October
Story: A group of interns are going through the usual grind when suddenly an accident changes their lives. The protagonist can't get let go of it and becomes obsessed with it. What does it all lead to? Is it love or something else?

Title: Devdas
Story: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

Title: Main Hoon Na
Story: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.

Title: Dilwale
Story: The siblings of two estranged lovers fall for each other, unaware of the violent past that drove them apart.

Title: Pihu
Story: A two year old must fend for herself when her mother suddenly passes by away while her father is gone for a conference, leaving her prone to danger.

Title: Delhi Belly
Story: Three struggling room-mates unknowingly become potential prey of a ruthless gangster.

Title: Mili
Story: Janhvi Kapoor as a woman stuck in a freezer fighting to stay alive. 'Mili' is the official Hindi remake of the Malayalam thriller 'Helen'.

Title: Pushpa: The Rule - Part 2
Story: The Clash Continues as Pushpa and Bhanwar Singh continue their rivalry in this epic c onclusion to the two-parted series.

Title: Sultan
Story: Sultan is a classic underdog tale about a wrestler's journey, looking for a comeback by defeating all odds.

Title: Ugly
Story: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

Title: English Vinglish
Story: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.
